title: I stole it. - Caldigit TS4 Dock and Element Hub
description: Thanks to CalDigit for sponsoring this video!  Learn more bout CalDigit's Thunderbolt 4 docks at:  TS4:  Element Hub:   Purchase TS4: CalDigit:  Amazon US:  Amazon UK:   Purchase Element Hub: CalDigit:  Amazon US:  Amazon UK:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  The USB-C and Thunderbolt hub market is HUGE due to laptops having fewer ports to make them more compact, so Caldigit sent over a few of their hubs for us to check out.  Want us to unbox something specifically for a video? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Intro 0:18 TS4 Unboxing 0:53 *groan* 1:14 Included accessories 1:56 WHY. 2:29 This is what makes the TS4 great 4:25 Other adapters 5:16 Trying it out! 5:50 Why 2.5Gb ethernet matters 8:01 I'm taking this home! 8:32 Unboxing the Element Hub 9:57 Trying it out 10:34 Conclusion 10:47 Outro
